title: Guardian of the One
description: Imagine the universe as a single entity to which all things are attached. Follow a Native American legend as the new Guardian of the One begins the task of bringing the world back to this understanding. Many powerful entities can not let this happen. Watch Gadge and Sammy, his Dreamer, as they unravel the mysterious links of the soul. Are they in time to save the wobbly cycle of life?
author: Roger L. Haller
